data.name: Pacific Pool Plastering
data.address: 209 W Main St #107, Grand Prairie, TX 75050

reviews.text: 209 W Main St #107, Grand Prairie, TX 75050 Confirmed by this business 11 weeks ago

Pool Resurfacing & Replastering Experts in Dallas–Fort Worth If your pool surface is rough, stained, or starting to crack, it may be time for resurfacing. Pacific Pool Plastering specializes in professional pool replastering, tile updates, and full surface renovation for both residential and commercial pools across DFW. Schedule a free resurfacing quote today.
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"He finished the whole project before time than he promised and stayed on budget." "He gave me a great price and had the job done very quickly." "The quality of work is outstanding including the customer service."

Thank you Hugo and team for turning our old swampy hopeless pool into a beautiful oasis again. Although our pool came with countless challenges,  it is absolutely functioning beautifully and we love! Thank you Pacific Plastering for doing a wonderful job! More
Extremely disappointed with this company’s replaster job and how they treat their customers. What should have been a professional upgrade turned into a frustrating and stressful experience. … More

Pacific Pools and Plastering did an amazing job remodeling our pool and spa.  Hugo’s guidance and expertise with the tile and stone work really helped us in making major decisions on the new look for our pool!  The crew that came out each … More Response from the owner a year ago We're thrilled to hear you're pleased with our work! Thank you for trusting us with your pool renovation.
